dataIdInfo.idPurp: Tool suite to produce view bearing and viewed landscape features, and viewsheds, visible areas, and visibility by observer surface from records in the Enjoy the View scenic quality inventory database maintained by the National Park Service Air Resources Division.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Tool suite to produce view bearing and viewed landscape features, and viewsheds, visible areas, and visibility by observer surface from records in the Enjoy the View scenic quality inventory database maintained by the National Park Service Air Resources Division.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: NPS Inventory and Monitoring Division and NPS Air Resources Division
